name: Task Donegeon
lastChange: Fixed a TypeScript build error on Vercel by refining the tsconfig.json include paths.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
prompt:
I just deployed in Vercel and got this error log:

error TS6305: Output file '/vercel/path0/vite.config.d.ts' has not been built from source file '/vercel/path0/vite.config.ts'.
  The file is in the program because:
    Matched by include pattern '.' in '/vercel/path0/tsconfig.json'
Error: Command "npm run build" exited with 2
Exiting build container
